entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a student who has to deal with Muggle business and is good at Quidditch.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is Harry's brother who chose Care of Magical Creatures as his subject.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who chose the same new subjects as him.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts that Harry is a part of.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of Gryffindor house.
Ron is a friend of Harry's.
